scaleOutTongue{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(1);-moz-transform:scale(1);-ms-transform:scale(1);transform:scale(1)}100%{-webkit-transform:scale(0.5);-moz-transform:scale(0.5);-ms-transform:scale(0.5);transform:scale(0.5)}}body.page-template-landing:not(.loaded):not(.start-loading)&gt;div:not(.loader){opacity:0}.loader{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:999;background-color:#fff;opacity:1}.loader
